text: Rogelio Polesello (26 July 1939 - 6 July 2014) was an Argentine painter, muralist and sculptor. He was best known for making Op art (or optical art) known in Latin America. He won two Konex Awards; one in 1982 and another in 2012. He was born in Buenos Aires. Polesello died from a heart attack on 6 July 2014 in Buenos Aires.
